shapes

Class PointBasedElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • shapes.GraphicElement
      • shapes.PointBasedElement
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Line, Polygon

    public abstract class PointBasedElement
extends GraphicElement
    Represents a point-based object on the canvas. A shape should extend this class if it is made up of any number of points that should be independently modifiable.
    See Also:
    GraphicElement, Line, Polygon
